tool_description: Measures dissolved oxygen levels in water to assess biological water quality, ecosystem health, and the effectiveness of aeration treatment processes.

sample_id.description: Unique identifier of the water sample being tested

measurement_method.description: Testing approach: electronic_probe, colorimetric_kit, or field_meter

water_temperature.description: Water temperature in Celsius for accurate DO calculation

atmospheric_pressure.description: Atmospheric pressure in kPa for altitude correction

salinity_ppm.description: Water salinity in parts per million for freshwater vs saltwater correction

error_messages: Invalid measurement method: Must be one of [electronic_probe, colorimetric_kit, field_meter]
Temperature out of range: Water temperature must be between 0°C and 40°C
Pressure correction needed: Atmospheric pressure significantly differs from sea level
Probe calibration required: Electronic probe needs calibration before measurement
Sample handling error: Dissolved oxygen levels affected by sample exposure to air
usage: Provide sample ID, measurement method, and water temperature. For accurate results, minimize sample exposure to air and calibrate electronic equipment properly.

oxygen_saturation_percent.description: Percent saturation relative to maximum at current conditions

biological_viability.description: Assessment of oxygen levels for aquatic life support

anaerobic_risk.description: Whether conditions favor anaerobic bacterial growth
